appName.description: Show if there are captions for the language you want in YouTube videos.

appDesc.message: Show if there are captions for the language you want in YouTube videos.
appDesc.description: This extension adds a caption tag for the language you want on the video thumbnail in the YouTube. (But if there are no caption, it doesn't add tags)

tagSizeRange.description: Label name for tag size range

filteringVideos.description: Shows only videos that has captions
